attributes.action: Stop all benefits to refugees crossing the channel.
attributes.additional_details: We have enough ex forces and others needing our help before helping refugees.
attributes.background: Stop aiding refugees that come to this country illegally.

rejection.details: Most non-EU nationals who are subject to immigration control are already not allowed access to "public funds", which include a range of benefits that are given to people on a low income, as well as housing support. It's not clear what changes you want the Government to make to these rules.
